name: Lichang
description: Lichang is designed to be a UGC (User-generated Content) platform and community platform centered on public chain mining. It is committed to becoming the top community in the public chain ecology. No Lichang, no public chain. The mission of LC is to empower the public chain ecology, with contribution mining as an entry point to form a co-existed, co-built and mutually beneficial blockchain community for public chain, KOL, users and Dapp. LC, the native token of Lichang, is regarded as the incentives released by the platform, and the utility token acts as the main payment method on Lichang.
